tracks.text: A letter M stands in a spotlight. It explodes into a rainbow of confetti. Media Factory.
A silver phoenix erupts in fire and circles of bronze light. Kadowkawa Video.
On a white background, the outline of a purple logo forms. A flaming phoenix surrounded by the words Kadokawa Pictures, Inc.
The Yggdrasil logo burns
Players with elaborate armor and weapons approach ominous ruins bathed in purple fog.
Skeletons stand up from mud and shuffle forward.
Some carry spears, other swords. Some skeletons are three times as large. The players stare down from a cliff.
The players leap down off the cliff.
Some players swing swords, killing skeletons. One spins a staff, a magic circles form in front of skeletons and they explode.
A woman strikes several at once. A large warrior swings a flaming axe.
A witch holds a staff. A jewel opens like an eye and casts a beam, dissolving skeletons where they stand.
A lion man punches the ground. Skeletons around him are flung back.
The players gather at the bottom of stairs, leading to the ruins.
At the top of the stairs, several figures stand in silhouette
In the center is a skeleton mage, wearing a cape, and holding a staff.
Lightning strikes over the ruins.
The lion man, warrior, and witch lie face down on the ground.
All of the players are down.
The skeleton mage stares from above, one eye burning.
Lyrics, Where did the answer go? Search for it
Where's my soul?
Text, Overlord
Lyrics, It's like a fear, just like a nightmare
Even when I wake, all I've got is bones
I'm in a panic? Get out, hurry
Oh, there're mysteries and miseries
Dead or alive, I'm being swayed by the line between them
If I wander, right to left to hell
Invitation to loneliness, withdrawal of emotion
I dance 1, 2, 3 steps on this dark stage
Raise your flag, march on, fight
My hand reaches for the mask's edge, but only my bones resound
Wars and swords, tears and blood
I suddenly find myself laughing at the overflowing power
Where is the answer? Search for it
Where's my soul? Where's my heart?
I'm getting swallowed up by reality
Don't hesitate, go this way
I don't know, I don't care
Even if I'm moving an imitation
I just have to live on in this world
Ah, the sadness of loss aches once again
Misery World
A slime monster sits nearby at a round table
The skeleton mage
Herohero-san has logged out
Momonga talks to himself
He looks out over the empty round table with 41 chairs. A staff spins behind him.
He hits the table. Damage 0 points
He gets up and walks to the staff
The top is a basket with 7 snakes biting colored marbles.
He picks up the staff, which emanates shadows
A butler and several maids bow in a row
Momonga opens a menu and looks at the NPC info
Sebas and the maids follow Momonga in a line
He stops at a 20 foot metal door depicting an angel fighting a dragon. The door opens.
A large room, at least 4 stories tall. Red flags with different logos hang from balconies. Blue chandeliers bearing burning candles hang over the red carpet.
Momonga walks
A woman with black wings and horns stands on a dais.
Sebas and the maids bow and stand aside.
Momonga sits and looks at Albedo
Flavor text paragraphs
On the outside, she is a perfect beauty. On the inside, she's a bitch.
He waves the staff. The info screen says administrator, and a keyboard pops up
He deletes the bitch line
Albedo stares blankly. She has yellow cat eyes, black hair down to her thighs, and white horns.
Albedo, Sebas, and the maids bow, placing a hand over their hearts
He looks at the flags lining the throne room. Time, 23:59
Momonga stares
He stands
Albedo stares up at him
She clasps her hands together, pushing up her 36DD chest
Momonga stares. He glows green.
He lets go of the staff. It floats and spins.
He holds her wrist
She blushes and smiles. She thrusts her chest forward, bouncing slightly. She wears a low cut, white dress, revealing cleavage. A yellow lace spiderweb sits over his chest, concealing nothing.
He reaches out a hand and brushes her skin,
She breathes heavily
She writhes, shaking her butt
Her eyes shimmer
She walks away
He holds out a hand. The staff comes to him.
He teleports into a stone passage
A red ring shines
He looks out over a stadium, beneath a purple night sky
Label, 6th Floor Amphitheater
A blond elf wearing a 3 piece suit leaps from the roof of the amhitheater, spins, and lands on the ground.
Mare leaps down. He carries a staff and wears a skirt.
He looks at the staff
The staff's red marble glows
Targets burst into flames
Humanoid armadillos shield the twins
A purple aura shields Momonga
A horned figure forms from fire.
Aura smiles
Aura and Mare stand in the arena, facing the giant, floating fire elemental.
The elemental breathes fire. Aura readies a whip and runs.
She leaps in the air and strikes with the whip. It cuts through the elemental's chest, which immediately repairs
A green shield forms and stops the elemental's claws
Momonga watches Aura jump around, striking with a whip from different directions.
The twins watch as a pillar of flame rises and dissipates
He reaches forward, and his hand disappears into a shadow. His hand reappears, holding a pitcher.
He pours water for the twins, who drink
A shadow appears. A pale woman with white hair steps out.
A silver humanoid insect and and a man in a suit with a metal tail approach. Albedo smiles.
The pale woman
The humanoid insect
The man in the suit
Momonga's eyes glow red
Lyrics, Don't you give me your love and passion?
Believe in love, even though there're borders and disturbances and more
I'm the only one who loves you because I'm crazy about you
Let's ride to hell, I'll serve you and go
If it means we can be together, I wish we could die
Beyond the line there is no ending
I swear, I'm going to be so fking grateful
Blessing word, you are supreme
I follow your orders loyally, your highness
You give orders, I won't give you to anyone
You are the most treasured existence
You don't know why my love is crying
I want to adhere, to the point of excessiveness
I want eternity, don't wanna cry
I'm about to go crazy with my jealous delusions
Don't you give me your love and passion?
Love is a riotous impulse, let go
Instinct over spirit, I demand more of your heart
I don't want to live in a world without you
Any future other than you, kill it, kill it
I would be happy to kill it for my love
I'm imagining now, if you're mine
It's like a paradise and haven and more
You're the only man who I love in my life and destiny and all
Don't you give me your love and passion?
I know the border. It should be wrecked, go!
Text, Next episode preview
